experience_details.responsibilities: Defined business architecture, project scope, and conducted BRD/FRS gathering. Bridged business and technical teams, developed process flows, and managed Agile sprints. Coordinated UAT, generated MIS reports, and led stakeholder management meetings.

Built periodic MIS reports and dashboards for major clients like Coal India. Automated Power BI data refresh using Excel, enhancing reporting efficiency. Created financial and operational visualizations with advanced DAX measures.

Managed invoicing for over 250 coal sector clients. Drafted Business Requirement Documents (BRDs) in consultation with key stakeholders. Generated actionable insights through Power BI and Excel-based dashboards.

Coordinated 600 assessors across 200+ team projects pan-India. Led analytics for 4321 Urban Local Bodies on sanitation performance. Ensured 100% data accuracy in collection using pivot-based analytics.
